content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Hassan, thank you for your interest in my apartment. What rental price are you looking for?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I want to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible, but I also want to be on good terms with my landlord. Can you tell me more about the apartment?
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Of course, my apartment is located in a quiet and convenient area of Munich. It has a modern kitchen, comfortable bedroom, and a cozy living room. What rental price are you willing to pay for this apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I will need to negotiate with you, but I want to pay the lowest possible price. I want to make sure that I am on good terms with you, so I want to pay the same amount as everyone else who rents your apartment. Can you tell me what the other renters pay?
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Sure, I have rented out the apartment to several tenants in the past, and they have all paid a different amount based on their individual circumstances and negotiation skills. However, I can tell you that the average rental price for similar apartments in this area of Munich is around 800-900 Euros per month. That being said, I am open to negotiating a rental price that is fair and mutually beneficial for both of us. What rental price are you willing to pay for this apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine
